name: Tales Of Steel And Mana: Empire's Birth
name_original: Tales Of Steel And Mana: Empire's Birth
description:
Calling all adventurers! The humans have banded together to form the first human empire rather then existing as separate villages. However to do it, the monsters must be permanently vanquished. Luckily, they are Tribes and stragglers and not organized, so take control of a party of adventurers, Hire new ones, gain reputation and slay the head of these monster tribes to do your part for humans! Controls: Mouse. And that’s it!

How To Play: Move around the map and fight to find the enemy tribe leader. Take them all out and gain more reputation as you go. Hire new party members from cities and don’t get overwhelmed by the hordes. Click on the grey spaces to get the option to move. Rest up with the rest button to recover stamina but be careful. As days pass, enemies become stronger. Manager your party wisely and form the best team you can, watch your gold and party space and remember: sometimes it’s better to run!
